content: With the Tender Jade Lotus Soak equipped, using the gourd slowly recovers a small amount of health for a short duration. This is a small added boost to your healing on top of your Drink of choice.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Graceful_Orchid.md', within the main section titled 'Graceful Orchid'.
The content is as follows:
With the Tender Jade Lotus Soak equipped, using the gourd slowly recovers a small amount of health for a short duration. This is a small added boost to your healing on top of your Drink of choice.
